originalText.text: The receptionists, doctors, and full staff here are top notch! Getting allergy shots on weekly basis (sometimes twice a week) is a heck of a commitment, and the staff always go out of their way to make me feel welcome and cared for. From the little details of greeting you by name with a smile, to the flexibility in scheduling around my calendar. The medical staff is also very knowledgeable - from a complete walk through of what to expect, to the talent of administering shots without even feeling a pin prick! That takes experience and talent.

originalText.text: I have been going around and around try to get my hives under control. No allergist was able to tell me what I had or how to keep it under control. But after coming here i was able to get help on day one of coming here. I have had six visits now and I can’t tell you how happy i am. I don’t have hives anymore and I don’t have to take any medication every single day. I am so happy I came here. The staff are so nice and kind. I would highly recommend this office, you will have a great experience!

originalText.text: We have had an awful experience with this clinic in so much as after one initial visit for a simple allergy check, we then received bills that look like we’d been in for some major surgery. They have added procedures to the bill that we never received and are unwilling to explain to us what the procedures covered, but maintain that we owe them a ridiculous amount of money for them. Upon inquiry we are then given multiple numbers to call, none of which are any help: we have been going through this for months. In short, avoid this bunch of scammers at all cost and just stock up on antihistamines! Criminal outfit.

originalText.text: Love this place! They have helped me so much with my allergies and also with my chronic hives. Dr. Pum is the best! So caring & knowledgeable. Also, the staff is so nice & wonderful! Definitely recommend for all allergy related issues

originalText.text: This is the best practice I’ve ever been a patient at. Everyone who works here is knowledgeable, kind, and prompt. I recommend them to everyone.
